doc.title: Playboy's Casting Calls 8
doc.plot: Playboy's Casting Calls is a sizzling and surprising look inside at the first-timers who are willing to bare it all for a shot at Playboy stardom. Also attached are the Screen Tests where you'll find untamed beauties who are willing to do just about anything to make it to the big screen. You won't believe how far these girls will go in front of the camera. It's all here raw and uncut.
